driver_statement: Coming into the first corner on lap one Dirk goes off the track out wide avoiding cars and then when he comes to rejoin the track he presses his accelerator quite harshly and spins himself out into all the oncoming traffic taking me out and giving me some quite major damage resulting in me limping back to the pits and then being a lap down and out of the race.
stewards_decision: NFA - We consider that neither driver is wholly or predominantly to blame
stewards_comments: Due to the avoidance of collision ahead and cold tyres car spins. This is a racing incident as no malice was intended.

driver_statement:
Coming out of T9, Maciej pulls along my inside. As i've seen him approaching i left more room to go into T10 to avoid collision. Despite i had the corner as i was still ahead, Maciej hit the curb and unsettled his car. Resulting to jump his car into my side and spinning me round. 
As this was the last lap of the sprint race, there was no need for such action in the final corners. Because of the incident i lost my P2 in class and ended P4. Maciej still got P3, wich is a bit unfair.
stewards_decision: Causing a collision or the appearance of a lack of control over the car.
stewards_comments: late move and a very tight line, this was going to always push the car to the outside and caused avoidable contact

driver_statement: nothing more than jumped the end of the FCY. but with my prior contact with my own teammate means they unintentionally got caught up in it
stewards_comments: Due to admin error with race director saying 'GREEN FLAG' we cannot penalise

driver_statement: At turn 14 Jochen takes a very odd line and is a different race to me, i had already taken my stop and was i a battle well ahead of the position i was. Anyways with the odd line and in changeable conditions i could not avoid and caused a collision resulting in damage.
stewards_comments: The stewards have noted the unpredictable line, further incidents like this in the future will be reprimanded.

driver_statement: After coming out the pits in p1 and being on a completely different race/strategy i struggle to get my tyres to temp at t3/t4 and let Ryan through. Entering into t10 i have a big run as if Ryan had a slow down and brake prior to him into t10 looking for a cutback into t11 however he moves in a braking zone ushing me onto a wet kerb and into him. this causes damage to my car and also hes in Silver class so had no benifit in battling?
stewards_comments: Car #13 needs to be aware of slower cars and adjust to the cars around them.

driver_statement:
Jochen is a lap or so down entering t1 on lap 17 jochen seems like hes letting me through and instead makes it a side by side almost into t3 costing me time to Schutte who im battling 
BLUE FLAGS???
stewards_comments: Nothing in to say either or.

driver_statement: Violation against championship document 27.2 and even hitting me being cautious when countdown was slready at "4" and turning my car
stewards_decision: Causing a collision or the appearance of a lack of control over the car.
stewards_comments: Caused a collision front to rear and spinning Jason, also -7 positions for overtaking under a FCY even though he gave them back this is not acceptable.
Overtaking under a FCY countdown.

driver_statement: Violation against championship document 27.2 and overtaking whilst countdown clearly started already
stewards_comments: Dirk never overtook.

driver_statement: Violation against championship document 27.2 and overtaking while countdown clearly started
stewards_comments: Incident already been delt with.

driver_statement: Hitting me from behind
stewards_comments: No incident found

driver_statement: I keep right entering turn 11 as tight as I can, as I am under a blue flag. Phil allows no room and turns into me, aiming for the apex (cockpit view) as though I am not there. Following this, I need to pit for repairs.
stewards_decision: Causing a collision or the appearance of a lack of control over the car.
stewards_comments: No room given when lapping car.

driver_statement: in turn three, i get understeer cuz of cold tyres there almost a car wide gap not enough tho but phil try anyway n knock me off the track.
stewards_decision: Causing a collision or the appearance of a lack of control over the car.
stewards_comments: No racing room given on exit.

driver_statement: Tim dive bombs the inside of T14, he could not slow the car down to make the apex and understeers straight into me causing a collision.
stewards_decision: NFA - We consider that neither driver is wholly or predominantly to blame
stewards_comments: Spotter would have called car right and also if replay is watched there was contact causing Tim to be pushed into Jason

driver_statement: Phil tries to go on the inside of T12, he opens the steering to the right, he drifts wide, making contact and causing a collision.
stewards_decision: Causing a collision or the appearance of a lack of control over the car.
stewards_comments: Understeering mid corner into Jason. More racing room to be provided.

driver_statement: Maciej goes wide at t13 off the track and rejoins unsafely, driving straight into me.
stewards_decision: Causing a collision or the appearance of a lack of control over the car.
stewards_comments: Unsafe re-join causing avoidable contact.

driver_statement: Ignoring blue flags
Ignoring blue flags, Stephen Fry and I are fighting for position, Maciej ignores blue flags and starts defending as if him and i are fighting for position.
stewards_comments: The Mercedes was quicker at the time and insufficient enough to say the blue flag conditions affected Jason.

driver_statement: Under braking into T4 car 44 sends a late dive bomb , I see him coming and leave space on turn in he’s still carrying too much speed and makes contact pushing me wide to gain position.
stewards_comments: Both cars at similar speeds and also make the apex. no damage was caused and both cars continue.

driver_statement: There is a major incident after turn 1 and I'm being cautious through it. Maciej looks like he just comes through with no caution, hits a car which then spears him into me causing me to spin
stewards_decision: NFA - No incident found on lap and corner reported
stewards_comments: No incident in the Feature race lap 2 turn 1.

driver_statement: Stone was overtaking and was on my inside, I gave him room, and then he hits the throttle and drives into the side of me on the exit. Very clean fight up until that point which started in T5. With an apology I wouldn’t be make this report.
stewards_decision: Causing a collision or the appearance of a lack of control over the car.
stewards_comments: George accelerates mid corner with a car on the outside creating understeer and contact resulting in both cars spinning.

driver_statement: Davide Favo Car 46, Lap 38. Ignores blue flags the whole lap and proceeds to battle me instead. I flash him twice on the start finish straight, so he is aware im a lapping car plus a higher class. Battles the whole lap, then after the checkered flag on the cooldown lap punts me off the track on turn one which felt personal, malicious and intentional.
stewards_comments:
Davide ignores blue flags and had opportunity to back out. 

Both drivers are also given a final warning as after the race they make contact and then a secondary retaliation contact. We feel this is very unsportsmanlike and looks poor. If this is seen again a penalty will be given.

driver_statement: In T4 car 81 drives into the rear of my car spinning me around.
stewards_decision: Causing a collision or the appearance of a lack of control over the car.
stewards_comments: Front to rear contact resulting in 2x cars having to pit for damage. Jack released the brakes contributing to the collision.

stewards_decision: Driving in a manner incompatible with general safety
stewards_comments: Not slowing on lap 8, turn 4 incident.
Not slowing on lap 8, turn 4 incident.

stewards_decision: Driving in a manner incompatible with general safety
stewards_comments: Not slowing for incident lap 8, turn 4.

driver_statement: Car 122  Blackwelll runs into the rear of my car at T3 resulting in a 4x for me breaching my incident threshold giving me DT.
stewards_comments: The 4x is invalid as penalties should not be that high. No damage and no loss of positions from the slight front to rear contact.

driver_statement: Rolls off the brake running into the back of me spinning me round
stewards_decision: Causing a collision or the appearance of a lack of control over the car.
stewards_comments: Paul releases brakes just prior to apex contributing to the causing a collision.
Car change
Car change
Car change
Car change
Car change

driver_statement: going into chicane Jason out brakes himself rejoin over sausage corner which make him end up right in front of me giving us both damage that i need to pit for
stewards_comments: Unsafe re-join causing avoidable contact.

driver_statement: Going into corner 5 I knew Mat was there and left him space. Going into corner 6 he tried to overtake me on the curb but made contact with the left side of my rear, which caused me to spin. He didn’t even try to reduce speed while being off-track.
stewards_decision: Causing a collision or the appearance of a lack of control over the car.

driver_statement: Phil spun, I needed to avoid him with a steer-spike to the right and the weight load on the car let me lose it, when on the gravel. I like to be fair. I wouldn't punish Phil for that. Wrong time, wrong place,but I like to know stewards opinion, so I know how to deal with it in the future.
stewards_comments: Stewards opinion slow down when able to see in incident as that wouldn't have understeered to gravel and spin.

driver_statement: In the entry of the curve Matthew bumped into me (my cockpit view) and following that I had a lot to do not to lose it, went wide and lost positions.
stewards_comments: front to rear contact resulting in a push to pass.

driver_statement: As I am new, I want to understand: Why does a lapped car involves itself into a very close fight for positions like that. Yes, he was a tiny bit faster, but what to ew need blue flags for, when lapped cars being a bit faster because of fresh tires or such race like that? I feel under an enormous pressure and hit Ryan (my fault), when trying to stay away from the lapped car putting pressure on me. I could have let him by, but is that the thing to do? So I am asking for the stewards point of view to learn. Sorry for bothering you.
stewards_comments: The lapped car can be behind as long as its safe and not making contact. If you know its a lapped car you as a driver shouldn't worry about it and focus on your battle. We also allow as per real life to unlap yourself ASLONG AS ITS SAFE AND DOESENT IMPEED THE FASTER CAR.

driver_statement: No matter why Dirk braked a little bit too late and I think Ryan left enough space here and Dirk is too blame to bump into Ryans rear left eventually damaging his rear left wheel (don't know though) and pushing Ryan out. Ryan left the race than (reason unknown).
stewards_comments: We have not had an accurate form submitted, plus we Ryan left the race. As per rules this will not be looked at or judged.

driver_statement: Was in a close fight with Wojciech. Fabian made room for Wojciech on Kemmel and than missed to let me go until Pouhon where I also lost quite some time needing to pass inside. I feel there were lots of options to let me pass, especially as Fabian was already a lap down.
Fabian spun and didn't hit the brakes, so he rolled into me when I was going by. My race for position was ended than. Right rear wheel torn away.
stewards_comments:
Fabian Koziołek should have held his brakes all the way through the incident however at last minute he releases them rolling slightly back. 

 Dirk Wagner had ample time to react to incident, however fails to slow sufficiently as it states in rules, this also contributes to the incident so we find neither driver predominately to blame.

driver_statement: Sean clark miss judged the line with a slight dive bomb made contact with my rear right wheel and caused me to spin, dropping 2 places
stewards_comments: Seany Clark was alongside at the point of turn in. Mat turns in as if hes not there causing the collision. Please look at apex speeds.

driver_statement: Car 199 sends a dive at the entry to T14 when I have already committed to turn in, he forces contact which spins me out causing damage for which I have to pit.
stewards_decision: Causing a collision or the appearance of a lack of control over the car.
stewards_comments:
Late move with no overlap causing Shaun to spin. 

We cannot determine if damage was caused as Shauns car was already damaged and also there was no meatball or flag given by iracing.
Car Change AMG to Mustang

driver_statement: Seany completely missed the braking point and hit me from behind at high speed, as a result I ended up in the barriers.
stewards_decision: Causing a severe collision, resulting in race ending damage
stewards_comments: Late brake or missed brake causing race ending damage.

driver_statement: Dom goes into turn 1 far to hot and hits the rear of me causing me to get bent steering
stewards_decision: Causing a collision or the appearance of a lack of control over the car.
stewards_comments: Dominik causes front to rear contact resulting in steering damage to William.

driver_statement: I came out of the pitlane, warm tyres at race speed. I broke at the normal braking line when Wagner attempts a divebomb from far back, I attempted to avoid contact by backing out, Wagner has too much speed and pushes me off the track, I have to resort to the sausage curbs to avoid a bigger accident. I loose a lot of time and a position by this move.
stewards_decision: Causing a collision or the appearance of a lack of control over the car.
stewards_comments: Late move causing contact with Zara

driver_statement: When lining up for racestart, there should be a 3 sec gap between each class. Oliver did not respect that and was in the back of Silver class drivers. Same can be said of Dirk Wagner and Jochen Siegert. They were allready at pit entry when me and Samy Ariba were still at T14-15. This has given them a fair advantage at race start.
stewards_comments: Oliver is meant to maintain a 3second gap to the last car in the other class. This is not maintained and also is not adhered to at the start procedure zone. The other 2x drivers are 3 seconds and above at the correct point Stijn is far back.

driver_statement: After attempting an overtake into turn 1 and 2 slight contact is made, heading into turn 5 I carry more speed but controlled to try get the move done into turn 6. Other driver overshoots and carry’s too much speed effectively having to hit the brakes on the exit of turn 6 which forces me to make contact and loosing positions.
stewards_comments:
Blocking. 

unsure on the line however the speed at apex was 20mph slower than previous laps and the angle on apex exit causes the block.

driver_statement: When lining up for racestart, there should be a 3 sec gap between each class. Oliver did not respect that and was in the back of Silver class drivers. Same can be said of Dirk Wagner and Jochen Siegert. They were allready at pit entry when me and Samy Ariba were still at T14-15. This has given them a fair advantage at race start.
stewards_comments: See previous incident #4037

driver_statement: When lining up for racestart, there should be a 3 sec gap between each class. Oliver did not respect that and was in the back of Silver class drivers. Same can be said of Dirk Wagner and Jochen Siegert. They were allready at pit entry when me and Samy Ariba were still at T14-15. This has given them a fair advantage at race start.
stewards_comments: See previous incident #4037

driver_statement: Mike did not move over for blue flag instead he blockes me from overtaking him on to the run up to turn 11
stewards_comments: Had opportunity in the straight to roll of throttle.

driver_statement: Brandon makes an unnecessary late challenge on the inside, i was ahead of him turning into the apex and he drives into my left rear causing me to spin and lose multiple positions.
stewards_decision: Causing a collision or the appearance of a lack of control over the car.
stewards_comments: late move with no lap causing front to rear contact.

driver_statement: Phil goes wide and off track on the exit of turn 6, he rejoins unsafely and makes contact with me causing a collision and sending me into the wall.
stewards_comments:
After reviewing the incident there are a few points we would like to make out. 
1) Phil comes on the circuit after letting a G driver through at a constant and steady line merging back to circuit before the grass starts. 
2) Jason has clear view of the incident and goes for the undercut however accelerates mid corner crowding Phil to the curb, this does not allow Phil to re-join in a safe manner and at the point of contact there is not a cars width left for Phil to re-join. 

Jason has ample room to the drivers right and would have made the pass with overspeed and we are unsure on why he crowded Phil so much?

driver_statement: Pushed off the track
stewards_decision: Causing a collision or the appearance of a lack of control over the car.
stewards_comments: Side to side contact with Dominik accelerating mid corner and pushing another car off track whilst not leaving racing room.

driver_statement:
248 took me out by pushing me off while being in the lead. My first 5 seconds. Hilariously it happens to be my team- and classmate. YAY! ;-) 
And yes, this is my only report this week, as I am done with learning about the league and it's sanctioing body. Thx for your work, mates!!!
stewards_decision: Causing a severe collision, resulting in race ending damage
stewards_comments: Failure to hit brake point and marker resulting in heavy contact and subsequent race ending damage.

driver_statement: Mike doesn’t respect blue flag and blocks my overtake on to the run up to corners 14/15
stewards_comments: Had opportunity in the straight to roll of throttle.

driver_statement: Coming out of T4 Dominik has a run but never gets next to me. My spotter did not say car left. I proceeds to take the racing line as T5 has a very small braking zone and you need to be next to someone to make an overtake. Dominik proceeds to drive like I am not there, takes me out causing damage to my car. Forcing me to pit early and drive with a full tank. Ruining my race.
stewards_decision: Causing a collision or the appearance of a lack of control over the car.
stewards_comments: late and desperate move resulting in contact. Due to there not being a meatball Dirk fortunate to get only a causing avoidable contact.

driver_statement: just before braking for 2 turn i was along side paul williams and he was behind mathew addy he move too go inside of addy but had clean me so we both spin off and crash
stewards_decision: Causing a severe collision, resulting in race ending damage
stewards_comments: Paul moves hard lift into Nigel causing them both to hit hard and have race ending damage, Please use spotters and/or radars.

driver_statement: Pushing for qualy Favo, lets 1x car through and is not on a lap however blocks a flat out corner and is oblivious to faster car approaching! causes significant damage and i tow which wrecks my qualy prep!
stewards_comments: Favo does not allow faster car approaching and on a lap to pass safely and seems to be unaware of car approaching with ample time to brake/ accelerate to get out of the way causing a spin and heavy contact. We have also seen the lead up to the slowing of the car into turn 1 and the lack of brake hold and contact with cars has been judged to complete this decision.

driver_statement:
Something NEW: I would like to report the iRacing system. 
Yes, I got a penalty as leaving the track in the chicane, but I crossed the line directly behind Zara McGuinness. This happened in the very last corner of the race and I would have had another 30 secs to suffer the penalty. So it´s not my fault  that the race was finished and the system took more than a minute from me.
Nothing is written in the rules about this situation  I know...but I would like to keep the position behins Zara .. even I was too stupid here and made a mistake :(
stewards_decision: NFA - No incident found on lap and corner reported
stewards_comments: We also reviewed the  incident on LAP 18, Sprint race. Even if the submission was correct Jochen had ample time to serve the slow down and not get a black flag so penalty would stand.

driver_statement: Into turn one Jack understeers, I left plenty of room, contact is made ultimately taking me out while leading bronze category effectively ruining my sprint race
stewards_decision: Causing a collision or the appearance of a lack of control over the car.
stewards_comments: jack has damage (known or unknown) and understeers into Zara causing an avoidable collision. Zara is the lead Bronze and battling closely with P2.

driver_statement: Fabian is 8 laps down with damage and lets us go in the most awkward way and nearly causing myself and benji to hit him
stewards_decision: NFA - No incident found on lap and corner reported
stewards_comments: No incident LAP 50 in Sprint.

driver_statement: Ignores blue flags and a few flashes from me, continues to fight me from T1 into T3, still continues to fight and not back off while im leading the bronze category and makes contact with me into T3. Had the chance to back off into T1.
stewards_decision: Causing a severe collision, resulting in race ending damage
stewards_comments: We can not 100% see if the pit was due to damage or scheduled. However the penalty has been deemed what is stated above for the fact Fabian is 3x laps down and battling a lapping car so hard causing visible damage and ignoring blue flags.

driver_statement: Was divebombed into 4 and forced into a spin costing 2 positions and destroying tyres after also being spun L1 T1
stewards_comments: Late move causing avoidable contact loss of positions. Also lap1 turn 1 is not a protest so will not be looked at.

driver_statement: Dominik goes for a gap that isn’t there and ends up hitting Shaun Schutte; Shaun’s car spins and collects myself as well as a few other drivers; effectively ruining our races at the first corner.
stewards_comments: See incident 5064 or incident #12

driver_statement: Ollie gets out of the way for the blue flag in a dangerous way causing me to nearly hit him and loose time to the car behind
stewards_decision: NFA - We consider that neither driver is wholly or predominantly to blame
stewards_comments: Oliver tries to go right and get off the racing line, allowing William to pass on the racing line. William goes for the cut back however Oliver is racing fairly and a miss calculation by both meet in the middle. neither meant malicious intention by this.

driver_statement: Jochcen is a lap down heading into the final chicane and doesnt get out of the way for the blue flag in a safe way causing me to hit him and half spin him and then casuing dom behind to pile into us aswell, both of us getting damage
stewards_decision: Causing a collision or the appearance of a lack of control over the car.
stewards_comments: Jochen looks as is if he is pitting however we are not 100% sure, however Jochen had ample time to let p1 & p2 battling past on way into chicane, with an unpredictable line caused all 3 to have a collision.

driver_statement: Dom tries to serve a slow down right infront of me, he is tapping the brakes out of turn 4 to clear the slowdown when i was quite close behind on the racing line
stewards_comments: At last element of chicane Dominik gets a slow down, and serves it on the racing line (as per rules not too), however it does not impede William. However if we see this again a ‘blocking’ penalty will be applied.

driver_statement: Shaun doesnt get out of the way going up to church corner and i nearly end up hitting the back of him mid corner
stewards_comments: Shaun allows one car through and enters the fastest corner in the UK, William barely lost time. and Shaun allows him to pass into chicane.

driver_statement:
(protest in twice as i messed the first one up, accidentally put sprint race as i was rushing to sign up to an offical race and messed up, killed at turn one as per imsa tradition)
Fabian is 8 laps down with damage and lets us go in the most awkward way causing myself and Benji to nearly hit him and loose time
stewards_comments: Awkward place to allow a car to pass but does not run wide or cause a mass loss of time.

driver_statement: I was in P1 bronze and slowed for pitts at which point Shuan made contact with my rear causing me to spin. He didnt brake upon point of contact and accelerated through me. I would have mad to pitts and not completely spun if he didnt accelerate through me. He didnt brake once.
stewards_decision: Causing a collision or the appearance of a lack of control over the car.
stewards_comments:
2 things here. 

1x shaun as stated does not attempt to slow down or avoid the incident as well as being a lap down. 

2x Mat under no circumstances is it acceptable to drive the wrong way down a track and then proceed to do a 3 point turn in the pit lane blocking the pits. 

Stewards will act very harsh if this is seen again!

stewards_decision: Driving in a manner incompatible with general safety
stewards_comments:
2 things here. 

1x shaun as stated does not attempt to slow down or avoid the incident as well as being a lap down. 

2x Mat under no circumstances is it acceptable to drive the wrong way down a track and then proceed to do a 3 point turn in the pit lane blocking the pits. 

Stewards will act very harsh if this is seen again!

driver_statement: Zara dived into me and I spun even I already had turned in and there would have been enough space on Zara´s right side to overtake me...instead Zara touched my (car´s) rear and  pushed me off the road..cost me several positions
stewards_comments: Jochen moves across a car in the braking zone causing the collision, please refer to the 2x cars ahead of Jochen and the 1x car ahead of Zara.

driver_statement: Car 84 sticks his nose into an ever decreasing gap where he never has overlap spinning me and multiple other cars out into the barriers causing a meatball.
stewards_decision: Causing a severe collision, resulting in race ending damage
stewards_comments: We are not quite sure on lap 1 of an hour race why as well on cold tyres Dominik has sent it down the inside with barely enough of a cars width? this then causes a large scale crash and with multiple cars having severe/ race ending damage! this is not acceptable driving and poor judgement.

driver_statement: Car 00 goes for a move on the inside into T3, he runs over the kerb can no longer keep control of his car and bumps me spinning me around.
stewards_decision: Causing a collision or the appearance of a lack of control over the car.
stewards_comments: Late move by Dirk having to go all over the kerb and causing understeer and collision into Shaun.

driver_statement: Car 014 exits T12 wide and then without indicating he is going to pit slows and tries to enter the pits from the middle of the track cutting across my path causing me to spin him.
stewards_comments: Please see incident 5060 incident #10
